entry.summary:
RT ropats16 (🧱, 🚀) ᵍᵐ Want to start building on @ArweaveEco? 🛠️🐘 Here’s a great toolkit with functions for: - wallets 💳 - transactions 🧾 - smart contracts 📄 - authentication 🔒 right-out-of-the-box 🧰 The process is made easier with the help of https://docs.arweavekit.com/arweavekit/introduction ✅ Happy Building! 🚀 https://twitter.com/communitylabs/status/1668832172508102656
